title: Jennifer Lawrence Red Carpet Style: 13 Times Her Outfits Made You Love Her Even More
title_page: Jennifer Lawrence Red Carpet Style: 13 Times Her Outfits Made You Love Her Even More
text:
Jennifer Lawrence is one of those rare Hollywood creatures who I just know I'd want to be friends with in real life. I mean, she's an absolute (but charming) klutz, she isn't afraid to say anything, and she's also an extremely talented actress who's been in an ever-growing list of amazing movies. (And seriously, if other celebrities adore J.Law, then she's got to be cool, right?)
Though we've all come to love her for her hilarious red-carpet interviews and goofball personality, there's one more reason I've been obsessing over J.Law for the past three years: her awesome sense of style. So to ring in the Oscar-winning star's 24th birthday, let's take a look at 13 times Lawrence's amazing looks made you love her just as much as her fabulous personality.
